title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: He began his senior career at Bayern Munich, playing mostly in the club's reserve side before his 2013 transfer to Bayer Leverkusen. A season later, he was signed by Premier League club Liverpool for £9.75 million where he made over 150 appearances across all tiers of competition and would ...

title: Emre Can
snippet: In Munich, he made his first appearance for the senior team on 12 August 2012 in a 2-1 Super Cup win against Borussia Dortmund. In 2013/14, he joined Bayer 04 Leverkusen and was signed by Liverpool just one year later, where he played a total of 167 games between 2014 and 2018.
